name: noStrudel
short_description: A nostr web client sandbox for exploring and learning the inner workings of the nostr network.
description: A nostr web client sandbox for exploring and learning the inner workings of the nostr network. noStrudel is a self-hosted application focused on social, nostr, decentralized, self-hosted. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host noStrudel on your home server to a nostr web client sandbox for exploring and learning the inner workings of the nostr network without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use noStrudel to manage your social workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
